metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36312 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.8.10.virt/kvm/kvm_main.c has a kvm_io_bus_unregister_dev memory leak upon akmalloc failure, aka CID-f65886606c2d.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
